div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','helpful_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15983'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -22, -50);

div.p: I stayed one night here after arriving late at the airport. Took a bit of time to find the shuttle area but no problems after that. All what you would expect from Holiday Inn with decent rooms, bar, restaurant and customer service. Good hotel and would stay again.

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','helpful_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15983'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -22, -50);

div.p:
We recently stayed one night at this property (chosen because we had an early flight out the next morning). We took a taxi from the airport to this hotel (and what we were told that should have cost $10 ended up $17 because he was unhappy with the "short fare" and kept turning around in circles and pretending he misunderstood...
More

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

div.p:
Spent the night here after having a flight cancelled at late notice. Despite the obvious inconvenience it was a very pleasant night. Lobby very pleasant. Staff efficient. Restaurant was good, though I chose the wrong dish - Ravioli was very stodgy but garlic bread lovely. Other foods bought out looked very good. Buffet breakfast was great with option of making...
More

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','helpful_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15983'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -22, -50);

div.p:
I booked in to the hotel as it was close to the airport. arrived early evening with a friend, enjoyed a quick meal in the Biggles Bar and then off to bed. Very comfortable room - there was a bath and I enjoyed a relaxing bath prior to sleep. I then departed early in the morning. All of the staff...
More

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -25, -50);

div.p:
The holiday inn was great. Our family of 4 stayed one night before heading overseas. It had airport shuttle buses and it was a great location as mascot station was right around the corner so we could go into the city for a look around. In the morning it had a delicious buffet breakfast which was what we wanted. We...
More

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','helpful_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15983'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -22, -50);

div.p:
This was a work realted trip and only one night but i have stayed here before many times. This hotel looks great when you get there. Checkin is clean and tidy and smart. The staff are great. Thats where the experience ends. The trip from the lift to the room is just disappointing which is fairly standard for Holiday Inns....
More

div.div:
pirodoi, General Manager at Holiday Inn Sydney Airport, responded to this review
September 11, 2013

p.span: Dear GregH272, Thank you for posting a review - delighted to read that the staff are great, makes all the difference when staying at hotels. I am pleased to advise that we are half way through our refurbishment focusing on updating all our guest rooms. As mentioned, we have completed our upgrade of all our beds as well as our...

div.p: I travelled along with my family. Hotel staff was excellent. Location is great. Though it is costly but worth living. Food is good. love to visit Sydney and stay at Holiday Inn Sydney airport. I recommend visitor to stay here and enjoy the lhospital;

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','helpful_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15983'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -22, -50);

div.p:
Great location as this hotel is close to Sydney airport. Many rooms have been renovated and look great. The restaurant in the hotel is very good as we had both dinner and breakfast there. Breakfast buffet would be a lot better if the hot food was actually hot versus luke-warm, especially the bacon and sausages given its $25 p.p. The...
More

div.onclick: ta.trackEventOnPage('Reviews','show_reviewer_info_window','review_count'); ta.util.cookie.setPIDCookie('15984'); ta.call('ta.overlays.Factory.memberOverlayWOffset', event, this, 's3 dg rgba_gry update2012', -10, -50);

div.p: very close to airport good for early flights meals very good and not to experience very quite also taxi was a bit late arriving but got us there on time would think twice about staying again the price of the room a bit dear for what you got

div.div:
pirodoi, General Manager at Holiday Inn Sydney Airport, responded to this review
September 11, 2013

p.span: Dear Connie M Thank you for your review - Great to read that the the hotel was a great choice and convenient prior to your early flight. The hotel can get very busy and we do have great specials available if you visit our website. We hope to welcome you back soon Ian Pirodon General Manager

div.a: “Nice and luxury, with great rooms. The price was not cheap, but it deserved. Love Sydney”

div.p:
Nice and luxury, with great rooms. The price was not cheap, but it deserved. Love Sydney. The location was great because of the metro, it was near the hotel. Maybe the wrong was that its Airport hotel so its very near it, and i don't want that. But in general i recommend it. I also want to say all the...
More

div.h3: Additional Information about Holiday Inn Sydney Airport

dl.dd: Holiday Inn Sydney Airport Hotel Mascot

div.address: Address: Bourke Road & O'Riordan Street, Mascot, Botany Bay, New South Wales 2020, Australia

div.onclick: ta.call('ta.commerce.meta.trackHotelRatingsInfoClickInHR', event);

div.div: Hotel Class:4.5 star — Holiday Inn Sydney Airport 4.5*

dd.span: Conveniently positioned, Holiday Inn Sydney Airport is located only minutes from the international and domestic airport terminals, providing regular transfers to and from the hotel. Situated in the centre of the local business district, the hotel provides you with easy access to the CBD via the motorway. A two minute walk to nearby Mascot train station will also have you in the city within 10 minutes.All 250 guest rooms have views towards the city skyline or airport and have been custom designed with guest comfort in mind. Standard rooms come equipped with a choice of soft and firm pillows, 32-inch flatscreen TVs, high speed internet access and ensuite with dual pressure showerhead. Enjoy a delicious Moroccan-inspired meal in the hotels signature restaurant, Sirocco, or socialise with friends and entertain colleagues with a relaxed drink and light meal in Biggles Bar.Within Holiday Inn Sydney Airport is an in-house gymnasium, same day laundry for the last minute rush and a business centre to stay connected and prepared for the trip ahead.Experience the relaxed and friendly service at Holiday Inn Sydney Airport.

dl.dd: TripAdvisor is proud to partner with Booking.com, Hotels.com, Expedia, Travelocity, Otel, Olotels, Priceline, Venere and Agoda so you can book your Holiday Inn Sydney Airport reservations with confidence. We help millions of travelers each month to find the perfect hotel for both vacation and business trips, always with the best discounts and special offers.

div.h3: Owners: What's your side of the story?

div.p: If you own or manage Holiday Inn Sydney Airport, register now for free tools to enhance your listing, attract new reviews, and respond to reviewers.
